author: Cat Bussell
description:
Our ongoing Daggerheart campaign led us further away from the DnD comfort zone towards a charming high-fantasy TTRPG bursting with anime goodness.

Continue reading Daggerheart may be all the rage, but don't sleep on this fantasy masterpiece
title: Daggerheart may be all the rage, but don't sleep on this fantasy masterpiece

author: Gab Hernandez
description:
Warhammer: The Old World may be a nostalgia act, but the Grand Cathay are a refreshingly welcome addition to the tabletop. These Eastern Fantasy-inspired armies have existed for a long time. However, Grand Cathay only existed in lore and video games until it finally became a part of the Old World. And one of their most beautiful miniatures is arriving for preorder, plus a new codex.

Continue reading Miao Ying storms into battle with her elite army in today's Warhammer preview!
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Warhammer: The Old World latest news, Warhammer The Old World rules, Warhammer The Old World factions
title: Miao Ying storms into battle with her elite army in today's Warhammer preview!

author: Cat Bussell
description:
The latest Magic: The Gathering previews for the upcoming Avatar: The Last Airbender set feel lost amid a sea of crossovers.

Continue reading The new Avatar The Last Airbender MTG spoilers are flavourful but left me cold
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: The new Avatar The Last Airbender MTG spoilers are flavourful but left me cold

author: Gab Hernandez
description:
While you can’t replace the tactile joy of a tabletop game, real life often gets in the way. After a busy workday, maybe you don’t want to pass by the hobby shop. But upon getting home, you realize you DO want to play some board games. How can you scratch that itch without other players there? For 90% off, the Table Top Tag Team Bundle can fix that itch fast.

Continue reading Enjoy the best of Direwolf and Marmalade's digital tabletop games for 90% off!
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Get monthly free games with Humble Choice, Check out the latest Humble Bundles, Browse ongoing Humble sales
title: Enjoy the best of Direwolf and Marmalade's digital tabletop games for 90% off!
